RATING 5.0 China King Buffet Corporation Chinese, Casual/Family, Fast Food, Buffet 122 Dover Crossing Road, Clarksville (931) 551-8182 LATEST REVIEW GOOD GOOD GOOD REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
RATING 4.0 Dairy Queen&Brazier American, Fast Food, Ice Cream/Yogurt Shop 1055 South Riverside Drive, Clarksville (931) 647-1616 LATEST REVIEW Good food, good price. Better than their new DQ Grill and Chill stores. Do yourself a favor, stick with the smaller DQ Brazier Burgers. You can't go wrong with them. REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
RATING 3.5 Olive Garden Italian Restaurant Italian, Casual/Family, Fast Food 2782 Wilma Rudolph Boulevard, Clarksville (931) 552-2585 LATEST REVIEW I've dined here 3 times. Every time I get pasta, there's enough water in it to take a swim. Not to mention, a couple of times the food had not too much flavor. REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
advertisements
RATING 3.0 Jack in the Box Fast Food 40 Dover Crossing Road, Clarksville (931) 648-4401 LATEST REVIEW I've been there numerous times, and never have they gotten my order right. Their food is ok, but I never get what I order. It would be a great place if they get employees and management that listens to customers. REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
RATING 2.7 Red Lobster American, Cajun/Creole, Seafood, Casual/Family 2838 Wilma Rudolph Blvd, Clarksville (931) 645-9872 DESCRIPTION We know the secret to great seafood is quality and freshness. That's why we've insisted on the finest seafood the sea has to offer since we opened our first restaurant in 1968. Since then, lots of things have changed. But one thing hasn't – our relen... LATEST REVIEW I went one day, and had to wait in an empty restaurant for 15 minutes while the waitresses were talking to each other. When I finally was seated, I waited a half hour, the place still empty, the waitresses still chatting, then I got up and left. Horr... REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
RATING 2.5 Mcdonald's Hamburgers American, Fast Food 1644 Fort Campbell Boulevard, Clarksville (931) 645-6662 LATEST REVIEW the food was good and the workers were nice .It did taked a long time to get food. REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
RATING 2.0 Jade Dragon Chinese Restaurant Chinese, Fast Food 110 Dunbar Cave Road, Clarksville (931) 647-7711 LATEST REVIEW The food we ordered was awfull. We ordered sweet and sour chicken sesame -spelling? and general tsos' chicken and i've never tasted this version of chinese food.The items we ordered are the most common ever seen on a chinese menu.It tasted the way a...
